title: An Act authorizing the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, acting by and through its Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance, to grant permanent easements over certain land in the town of Milton for highway purposes

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Driscoll, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2657) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of William J. Driscoll, Jr. for legislation to authorize the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, acting by and through its Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance, to grant permanent easements over certain land in the town of Milton for highway purposes.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
Reporting date extended to Saturday January 31, 2026
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
